# General Plugin Info do not edit

base   prompt
author Schplurtz le Déboulonné, Chris P. Jobling; Stephan Chazelas; Andy Webber
email  Scplurtz@laposte.net, C.P.Jobling@Swansea.ac.uk, stephane.chazelas@emerson.com, dokuwiki@andywebber.com,
date   2019-07-13
name   PROMPT, former Command Line Interface (CLI) Plugin
desc   Renders transcripts of command line interactions, e.g. for shell and dynamic language interpretor tutorials
url    https://www.dokuwiki.org/plugin:prompt
